content.title: Robotic Surgery
content.statement: Robotic Surgery is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery General that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Robotic Surgery helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Robotic Surgery include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Robotic Surgery.

citations.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
